name: Paul Graur
generalInfo: I'm Paul Graur, an experienced IT professional deeply involved in outsourcing, staff augmentation, and consulting services. Currently serving as the CEO of SoftLion, a rapidly advancing company specializing in ecommerce and blockchain technologies. At SoftLion, we are committed to innovation and strive for excellence. My expertise spans a wide range of technologies, including React, Vue, Angular, Node.js, Java, C#, and more. These skills enable me to stay at the forefront of the ever-evolving IT landscape. I'm dedicated to leading the team at SoftLion, propelling the company's growth, and positioning it as a highly promising entity in the ecommerce and blockchain domains. For a detailed overview of my work and SoftLion's achievements, feel free to visit our website, where you can explore my profile and learn more about the remarkable journey of SoftLion.

name: Yurii Matvii
generalInfo: I'm Matviy Yuri, an experienced IT professional with a robust background in outsourcing, outstaffing, and consulting services. With numerous years of industry expertise, I currently hold the position of Chief Technology Officer (CTO) at SoftLion, a leading company in the ecommerce and blockchain sectors. SoftLion stands out as a highly promising entity in these domains. In my role as CTO, I am deeply involved in harnessing an array of technologies to drive our projects forward. My proficiency spans across a spectrum of technologies including React, Vue, Angular, Node.js, Java, C#, and various databases. I've honed my skills over the years, not only in programming but also in effectively organizing and strategizing to ensure the optimal functioning and growth of our company. For more detailed insights about my journey and SoftLion's impactful ventures, feel free to explore our website. Your curiosity is always welcomed.

name: Tetiana Hlushko
generalInfo: I'm Tanya, a highly skilled UI/UX designer with extensive experience. My expertise lies in creating engaging landing pages and e-commerce designs that embody the essence of a company, particularly for clients associated with SoftLion. I am deeply passionate about my work and make it a priority to stay up-to-date with the latest trends in web design, ensuring that the projects I undertake are always modern and visually appealing. My dedication to design excellence is evident in every project, making me a valuable asset to the SoftLion team.
